**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T01:24:05Z" title="04/01/2015 01:24  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by dfg26**
lol. I remember a ride like that. And yeah, it did a very good job of making people sick. Someone here made a carousel and I think a ferris wheel of sorts is around here somewhere as well?
add a decoupler under the cuppola ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> add a decoupler under the cuppola ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

edit: oh, do you mean so I can eject it away? That will not work.
